sense.def:
Revelations
so zanimiva dejstva, za katera zvedo ljudje.

seg.quote: His book offers no illuminating personal revelations.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka izkušnja
a revelation to someone
, tisti osebi prinese spoznanje o nečem, česar prej ni vedela.

seg.quote: The whole episode was a revelation to him of how poor the family had been.
